original_title: Bring Me The Horizon : Live at Wembley
overview: Bring Me The Horizon performed their largest headline show to date at a sold out Wembley Arena in December 2014. This full-length concert film from the night features the biggest tracks from the bandâ€™s 10 year career, including latest hit single 'Drown'.
title: Bring Me The Horizon : Live at Wembley
